divs: sighting detailslooking north, 1st bright orange light came s-e down over distant mountain. slow steady turn in e. direction, then up toward n.[ large arc ] 1st light before going out of sight made very fast wiggling decent, then up & gone. last two lights moved in same path, but no movement before going out of sight. watched through binoculars held firm against vehicle. whole incedent very similar to july 4th event of 2009. lights had form,but w\ clouds & distance, cannot make id.
trends: There have been no other sightings in w-b, pa.
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 orange lights north of wilkes- barre, pa. follow same path
